version_description:
Has spring already arrived where you live? Then the City of Shadows really needs your help! The sprout from the Tree of Life, which has the power to awaken the world from its winter's sleep, was stolen from the Magic Forest. All evidence points to trolls being involved in the abduction. Download this fairy-filled update and bring spring to the City of Shadows!

NEW HIDDEN OBJECT SCENE – They say there's only one place where spring never comes: the mysterious Troll Market, which was believed to be merely a figment of the imagination. But what happens to the City if this market truly exists?
“TREE OF LIFE” EVENT – Complete 36 challenging quests, gather five ravishing collections and be rewarded with a Spirits of Nature Amulet, special Spring Fairy totem and lovely male and female Avatars.
FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS – Your favorite game is only getting better. Check it out!

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Something incredible is happening in the City of Shadows! Drops of rain are freezing in mid-air, lightning is striking upwards into the sky and the leaves on the trees are turning back into buds. Time has stopped its normal flow, and the anomalies keep getting stronger and stronger. Download this FREE update and bring peace to the City!

NEW HIDDEN OBJECT SCENE - Investigate the mysterious Laboratory of Time and find out if it's behind the anomalies that are happening in the City.
"MASTER OF TIME" EVENT - Complete 36 challenging quests, gather five mystical collections and win the Edge of Time Amulet, special Chest of Time and unique male and female avatars. Also, there is now the Pavilion of Prophecy in the City's central square. Come in and find rare artifacts and prizes every day!
MORE FRIENDS, MORE GIFTS - Now you can visit your friends, help them and get prizes.

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

1.13.1301更新
我们已经修复有关迷你游戏奖励的问题。继续畅享这场身临其境的历险吧！

1.13.1300 更新
暗影之城发生了令人难以置信的事情！雨滴冻结在半空之中，闪电击向头顶的天空，树上的绿叶变回嫩芽。时间停止了正常流动，种种异象变得愈加严重。下载这款免费更新，为暗影之城带来安宁吧！
新的隐藏物品场景 –调查神秘的时间实验室，查清暗影之城里发生的异象是否源自于此。
“时间大师”活动 –完成36项极具挑战性的任务，收集5套神秘收藏，赢得时间边缘护符、特别的时间宝箱以及独特的男女头像。另外，预言之亭现已出现在城市中心广场。记得每天去那里寻找稀有的神器和奖品！
朋友越多，礼物越多 –现在你可以拜访朋友，帮助他们并获得奖品。

加入 G5 电子邮件列表，在第一时间获得游戏销售和发布的信息以及和游戏相关的新闻！www.g5e.com/e-mail

A mysterious event occurred in the first days of summer: strange voices and shafts of otherworldly light emerged from behind the locked door of the Room of Fate. Yet no one is able to enter it. Download the new update and be among the first to find out the city's latest secret!

MEDIUM'S SECRET EVENT – Rid the Room of Fate of the restless spirits and save its mistress. Complete more than 35 challenging quests, gather five unique collections and win gorgeous male and female avatars, the magical Spiral of Fate Amulet, a special Ghostly Chest and other valuable rewards and bonuses.
FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS – Experience these important optimizations for yourself!

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Summer’s warmth has filled the City of Shadows with the scent of flowers and the twittering of birds. But mysterious things are happening in the City again, and this time a famous writer is involved. Download this fresh update and hurry to start your investigation!

NEW HIDDEN OBJECT SCENE – The City’s residents recently noticed that a new park has appeared in the Riverside neighborhood. Yet behind its high fence, entwined with blooming roses, they can hear gunshots, screams and cries for help. What's going on in there?
“SUMMER DETECTIVE” EVENT – Complete 34 challenging quests, gather five ravishing collections and be rewarded with stylish male and female avatars, the Writer's Portrait Amulet, a special Secret Box and other valuable rewards and bonuses.
FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS – Your favorite game is only getting better. Check it out!

There's a rumor in the City that the clouds over the Enchanted Hotel are dissipating. Does this mean that the mysterious One Day spell, which has held Lady Peacock captive within the Hotel's walls for a century, has finally broken? Hurry to download this thrilling update and find out if Lady Peacock is destined to reunite with her beloved English Captain!

NEW HIDDEN OBJECT SCENE – For 100 years, the Pier has been stuck in the same day, but now the sea has come alive, and a white sail has appeared in the harbor. Will the encounter be joyful for City residents?
“MYSTERIOUS VOYAGE” EVENT – Complete 34 challenging quests, gather five ravishing collections and win the Carved Box smelling of Oriental spices, the Blue Lotus Amulet and gorgeous male and female avatars.
FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS – Your favorite game is only getting better. Check it out!

It seemed the Manor House Gate would be closed forever. Lately, however, laughter and the clinking of glasses can be heard at the Manor House. Is the Enchanted Ball coming back to life? Or are dark forces trying to break out and turn the whole City to stone like the Ball's guests? Download this fresh update of your favorite game and hurry to solve this mystery!

“GHOSTLY DANCE” EVENT – Explore the Enchanted Ball's majestic ballroom and find out what brings Juliette there nightly. Complete 34 challenging quests, gather five ravishing collections and win the Gilded Chest, the special Soul of the Ball Amulet
and gorgeous male and female avatars.

There is a distinct smell of autumn in the City, with fallen leaves crunching under foot. This means Halloween is coming! Download this suspenseful update and find out what tricks and treats await you in the City of Shadows.

NEW HIDDEN OBJECT SCENE – Jack, the Halloween Spirit, has fallen in love! Help him organize a Masquerade Ball and capture the heart of his beloved.

Get ready to celebrate Thanksgiving not only with turkey and stuffing, but also with an immersive update of your favorite adventure!

NEW HIDDEN OBJECT SCENE – According to legend, real miracles were performed during the Thanksgiving Fair. But one day something went wrong: the magic disappeared, and the square was concealed by fog. If the Thanksgiving Fair has started to reappear, it would seem that the City is ready to reveal another one of its secrets!
THANKSGIVING DAY SECRET EVENT – Complete 35 absorbing quests, assemble five marvelous collections and win the Pumpkin with a Secret, the special Thanksgiving Amulet and unique male and female avatars.

Snow is blanketing the City of Shadows, which means Christmas time is coming! Spend the holidays with this festive update of your favorite adventure and get ready for special gifts and wondrous surprises.

NEW HIDDEN OBJECT SCENE – Have you heard about The School of Christmas Wonders? It's believed that Christmas starts in this school, so that Santa Claus can release the wonders into the world when the time comes. This place is shrouded in mysteries and legends, but maybe you could unravel a few?
“MYSTERY OF THE CHRISTMAS SCHOOL” EVENT – Complete 35 challenging quests, piece together five exclusive collections and be rewarded with a Winter Sunshine amulet, special Snow Globe totem and unique male and female avatars. Also, there are a lot of everyday gifts for you all over the city. Gather them in the bag and don’t delay the opening!
MORE QUESTS AND COLLECTIONS – Tackle 48 new quests and eight new collections. Can you master them all?

NEW HIDDEN OBJECT SCENE – All the citizens have gathered in the Ice Palace to celebrate Christmas and have fun at the ball organized by the sorceress Lumica. But Santa can't start Christmas as the great Christmas Book, where the future is written, has been frozen! He blames Lumica, who claims she's innocent. Will you be able to find out who the real villain is and save Сhristmas?
CHRISTMAS BALL EVENT – Complete 35 challenging quests, collect items in bonus mini-games and be rewarded with the "Winter Treasure" amulet, the "Snow Globe" totem, the unique avatars of the Glorifiers of Christmas and an amazing super avatar.
MINI EVENTS – The City has prepared lots of different short events with valuable prizes. Check the game every day so you don’t miss any!
